medical_history.history_of_present_illness: RLQ pain started at noon yesterday, has been persistent and worsening. Associated symptoms include nausea, vomiting, and reduced appetite with minimal oral intake. No measured fevers, but patient experiences subjective chills. No changes to bowel habits, continuing to pass flatus.
medical_history.family_history: No family history of inflammatory bowel disease (IBD) or colon cancer
